text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Would you be interested in attending<n>the fireworks festival
with me tonight?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On a hot afternoon in the middle of<n>summer camp, Mihono
Bourbon<n>approaches me with a slightly<n>nervous look on
her face.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I blurt out my reply without a second<n>thought. It's the first
time she's ever<n>invited me to something. Excitement<n>
bubbles inside of me as I wait for the<n>evening to come.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
According to my research, there are<n>an average of 70,000
attendees and<n>ninety stalls. Out of the stalls, we<n>have nine
games to choose from.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Shooting gallery, candy-cutting,<n>goldfish scooping, yo-yo
balloons, ring<n>toss, raffle draw, string lottery, punch<n>box, or
watermelon splitting. Where<n>should we begin?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her usual passive demeanor<n>dissolves as she rattles off a
list of<n>activities. A look of determination<n>sparkles in her
eyes.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I neither like nor dislike them. I would<n>say I have an average
amount of<n>appreciation for them.
choice_data_list: Then why did you want to come here today?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...I believe that spending time together<n>will deepen our
connection.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Well... up until now, I have been<n>categorizing social events
like this as<n>inconsequential.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: But perhaps... I was mistaken.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she speaks, a hint of emotion<n>colors her voice. Her hand
brushes<n>against her pocket, revealing a<n>familiar-looking
stuffed animal.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The small round eyes of the bunny<n>peek out from
underneath the fabric.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
For a long time, I struggled to<n>understand the significance of<n>
"having fun."

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
But for some reason, when this toy is<n>with me, training and
studying become<n>radically different. My motivation<n>levels
are amplified.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Ever since I began engaging in social<n>interactions, I've
realized that there is<n>value in pursuing "enjoyment."

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Perhaps this is what my parents<n>wanted me to understand.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Not sociability as a parameter, but as...<n>something warmer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon's words come<n>together like puzzle pieces,
spelling<n>out her growth and awareness. I feel<n>prouder
than ever, knowing how much<n>effort it must've taken to
arrive at this<n>conclusion.
choice_data_list:
All right, I'm feeling pumped now! We're gonna
have tons of fun tonight!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I lead the bemused student onto the<n>crowded main street,
eager to make<n>the best of the evening.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Please aim five degrees lower.<n>You're too low now, go
up—that's<n>right, stop right there.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Click, pop!

text_block_list.name: Shooting Gallery Staff
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, you're a good shot, mister!<n>Congrats on winning the
grand prize!
choice_data_list: It's all thanks to her directions!

text_block_list.name: Shooting Gallery Staff
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, you're a good shot, miss!<n>Congrats on winning the
grand prize!
choice_data_list: It's all thanks to her directions!

text_block_list.name: Shooting Gallery Staff
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, that's what I call teamwork!<n>Here ya go, now
don't lose it on the<n>way back home!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We visit nearly every game stall,<n>basking in the festivities.
Time flies<n>and before we know it, the night<n>draws to a
close.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
The fireworks will begin shortly. I<n>suggest we move to a
better location<n>for optimal viewing.

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Huh? Is that... Bourbon?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Waving at us from the distance is the<n>girl who approached
Bourbon the<n>other day.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
You engaged me in conversation<n>during my break.
Statistically, this<n>action suggests a underlying motive.

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I just wanted to talk to you... I'm<n>sorry for taking up your
time! I'll get<n>going now!

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I didn't expect to bump into<n>you here! What a
coincidence! O-oh<n>but, I'm sorry if I'm interrupting you<n>
two...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No need to worry. ...Did you also<n>come here to observe the
fireworks?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Tonight's display will showcase an<n>impressively large
circular design as<n>the centerpiece. It is something that I<n>
am, as you would say, "looking<n>forward to."

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Umm... That's it? You're just looking<n>forward to the
fireworks? Like, no<n>scientific reason or anything?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Correct.

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The Umamusume looks at Mihono<n>Bourbon, puzzled by her
simple<n>response.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the past, the stoic student<n>would've launched into an
analytical<n>monologue. Now, she's taking in the<n>sights and
living in the moment.
choice_data_list: Why don't we go watch them together?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Are you sure?
choice_data_list: It'll be fun with more people around!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Understood.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Carefully, Mihono Bourbon turns to<n>the student.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Would you like... to view the fireworks<n>together?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Peeew! Boom!

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Wow, they're so pretty! I wasn't<n>sure about coming to the
festival by<n>myself, but I'm really glad I plucked<n>up the
courage!

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Bumping into you, looking at pretty<n>things together—ah,
sorry! I hope I'm<n>not boring you with this<n>conversation...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No, please continue. Do you find<n>these explosions
enjoyable?

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I love them! It doesn't matter<n>whether they're big or
small, just<n>being around them makes me feel<n>like I can do
anything! I love<n>experiencing things that I normally<n>can't,
like fireworks or even being

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text: with people!

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
...Which is why I got a little ahead of<n>myself. I'm sorry if I
made you<n>uncomfortable earlier when I called<n>out to you.
Sometimes I'm not good at<n>keeping my distance...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I understand. If calculating distances<n>is not your forte, then I
may be of<n>great assistance.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
For example, there are thirty-four<n>centimeters of space
between us. The<n>shaved ice stall behind you at four<n>
o'clock is eight meters and<n>twenty-four centimeters away.

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Are you... naturally like this?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
If you are referring to my physical<n>composition, then yes, I
am all natural.<n>I do not possess any mechanical<n>
components.

text_block_list.name: Honest Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I think I figured you out now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Underneath the spectacular<n>illuminations, the two students
chatter<n>away as if the fireworks will never<n>stop.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next day.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Hello, Father, it's Mihono Bourbon. I<n>am calling to inform
you that your<n>order has been exec—

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Actually, my apologies. I would like to<n>report a change in
personal affairs<n>instead.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I... made a friend.
